title: 3 Ways to Quickly Turn Off Your PS4 Controller

steps.title: Locate the PS button on your controller.
steps.content: Locate the PS button on your controller. It's usually in the center at the bottom of your remote.

steps.title: Press and hold the PS button for 10 seconds.
steps.content: Press and hold the PS button for 10 seconds. Instead of quickly pressing it, which can either prompt your TV or console to power on or open a menu, you want to hold the button down for about 10-15 seconds. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Release the button when the light on your controller turns off.
steps.content: Release the button when the light on your controller turns off. You'll notice that the light turns off, which indicates that your remote is off. [2] X Research source If this doesn't work for you or holding the button down for more than 15 seconds does nothing, try the next method.

steps.title: Open the Quick menu.
steps.content: Open the Quick menu. To do this, press and hold the PS button for 2 seconds. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to Sound/Devices.
steps.content: Navigate to Sound/Devices . This is in the panel on the left side of the window next to an icon of a keyboard and controller.

steps.title: Select Turn off Device and select your controller.
steps.content: Select Turn off Device and select your controller. This will prompt your console to turn off your controller. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Quick menu.
steps.content: Open the Quick menu. To do this, press and hold the PS button for 2 seconds.

steps.title: Navigate to Sound/Devices.
steps.content: Navigate to Sound/Devices . This is in the panel on the left side of the window next to an icon of a keyboard and controller.

steps.title: Select "Set Time Until Controllers Turn Off" and choose a time limit.
steps.content: Select "Set Time Until Controllers Turn Off" and choose a time limit. You can choose 10 minutes, 30 minutes, or 60 minutes. This setting is disabled when your controller is connected via USB. [5] X Research source After you pick a time, your controller will automatically turn off after inactivity for your selected period of time.
